scripts.png2src @NOTE: # Could use a --template instead of sed replacement. Also, probably worth pulling this out into a script. Also, I'm not 100% sure bash is needed specifically. Also --output option didn't work for me.
scripts.png2src: bash -c 'rm png2src-generated/*; for f in src/png/*.png; do w4 png2src --assemblyscript $f | sed "s/const/export const/g" > png2src-generated/$(basename $f .png).ts; done'
